title: Auto-Loop State
description: Schema for the auto-loop state file (.claude/auto-loop.local.md YAML frontmatter)

max_iterations.description: Maximum number of iterations before stopping

scope.description: Whether to auto-select tasks or use a specific list

task_ids.description: Specific task IDs to process (only when scope is 'selected')

started_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the loop started

current_task.description: Task ID currently being worked on, null if between tasks

completed_tasks.description: List of task IDs completed during this loop
